text: Niccayamaka allah niti celuttumarum, nanmai ceyyumarum, uravinarkalukku kotuppataiyum kontu (unkalai) evukiran; anriyum, manakketana kariyankal, pavankal, akkiramankal ceytal akiyavarrai vittum (unkalai) vilakkukinran - ninkala ninaivu kurntu cintippatarkaka, avan unkalukku nallupatecam ceykiran
